author: beforeitsnews.com
title: The Real Reason 5 Russian Diplomats Just Died—What They Want Hidden Has Been Publicized | Power Elite
text:
(Before It's News)
By Lisa Haven
Call it a conspiracy or call it a coincidence five Russian diplomats have died in less than 3 months time due to either a murder or a heart attack.
Petr Polshikov , a high-ranking Russian diplomat from Moscow who was the senior figure of the Latin American department, was found dead in his home with a bullet wound to his head. Died December 2016. Hours before Petr Polshikov was murdered, Andrey Karlov , Russian Ambassador to Ankara, Turkey, was shot in the back at an art gallery by an off-duty rouge cop who was shouting rants about “Allah” “Syria” and “Aleppo” saying we should not forget them as he fired multiple shots into Karlov’s body. Died December 2016. Senior Russian diplomat to Greece, Andrey Malanin , age 54, was found dead in his bathroom in Athens. At this time, the cause of death remains unknown. Died January 2017. Russians Ambassador to India since 2009, Alexander Kadakin , age 67, reportedly died in India of a heart attack. Died January 2017. Most recently Vitaly Churkin , Russia’s permanent representative to the United Nations since 2006. Died suddenly in New York a day before his 65th birthday. Reports claim he became ill and was taken to the hospital where he died. As it stands it’s being labeled a “heart attack”. Died February 2017. Considering the US democratic government is labeling patriots as “Russia Spies” with no evidence whatsoever, could there be a US “agenda” underway? I believe it’s possible! These men have a few things in common that might make you think twice.
All that and more in this MUST SEE report…
